channel.title: CVE Feed for SolarWinds -- Orion Platform
channel.description: The latest CVEs for SolarWinds -- Orion Platform

item.title: CVE-2021-27258|2024-08-03T20:48:15.879Z -- solarwinds -- orion%20platform
item.description: This vulnerability allows remote attackers to execute escalate privileges on affected installations of SolarWinds Orion Platform 2020.2. Authentication is not required to exploit this vulnerability. The specific flaw exists within the SaveUserSetting endpoint. The issue results from improper restriction of this endpoint to unprivileged users. An attacker can leverage this vulnerability to escalate privileges their privileges from Guest to Administrator. Was ZDI-CAN-11903.

item.title: CVE-2022-36961|2024-08-03T10:21:32.333Z -- solarwinds -- orion%20platform
item.description: A vulnerable component of Orion Platform was vulnerable to SQL Injection, an authenticated attacker could leverage this for privilege escalation or remote code execution.

item.title: CVE-2022-36965|2024-08-03T10:21:32.389Z -- solarwinds -- orion%20platform
item.description: Insufficient sanitization of inputs in QoE application input field could lead to stored and Dom based XSS attack. This issue is fixed and released in SolarWinds Platform (2022.3.0).
